parameters.name: CertifyId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for real person authentication.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: Remark, with a length less than 32 characters.

parameters.name: SceneId
parameters.description: Authentication scene ID. This ID is automatically generated after creating an authentication scene in the console. For instructions on how to create an authentication scene, see Adding an Authentication Scene.

parameters.name: ServiceCode
parameters.description: ServiceCode for the real person cloud product, value: **antcloudauth**.

parameters.name: ValidDay
parameters.description: Whitelist validity period in days (only supports 3, 7, 30).
